奣字的基本解释

奣
wěng
天空晴朗无云。

奣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wěng］
［《廣韻》烏猛切，上梗，影。］
(1)天色清明。
(2)用于人名。
(3)用于地名。江苏省昆山市有奣子桥。

奣字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【大字部】　奣； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页253第11
【廣韻】【集韻】?烏猛切，音䁝。【六書略】明也。一曰六合淸明也。　又【集韻】古猛切，音懭。義同。　又【字彙補】橋名，在蘇州崑山縣。元末方國珍趨奣子橋，與張士誠戰。　又【三尊譜錄】元始上皇丈人法諱奣。

奣字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
奣字的起名意思

暂无。

Yin
Basic explanation of words
Yin
wěng
The sky is clear and cloudless.
Yin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wěng］
["Guangyun" Wu cuts fiercely, the upper stem, the shadow. ]
(1) The sky is clear and bright.
(2) Used for names.
(3) Used for place names. There is Hengzi Bridge in Kunshan City, Jiangsu Province.
Yin
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Da Zi Department] 　奣; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: Page 253-11
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Wu cuts fiercely, and sounds eccentric. 【Six Books Brief】Ming Ye. One said Liuhe is also Ming.　[Jiyun] Gu Meng cut, sound 懭. The same meaning.　 Also [word replenishment] the name of the bridge, located in Kunshan County, Suzhou. At the end of the Yuan Dynasty, Fang Guozhen approached the Xiuzi Bridge and fought with Zhang Shicheng.　[Three Spectra Records] Yuan Shi went to the emperor’s father-in-law.
